headlines.description: — Fraser Minten scored at 2:12 of overtime to give the Boston Bruins a 4-3 victory over the Chicago Blackhawks on Thursday night in their home opener.
headlines.shortLinkText: Fraser Minten scores in overtime to lift the Bruins past the Blackhawks, 4-3

events.name: Montreal Canadiens at Detroit Red Wings

headlines.description: — Mike Matheson had a goal and an assist and the Montreal Canadiens spoiled Detroit's season opener with a 5-1 victory over the Red Wings on Thursday night.

events.name: Ottawa Senators at Tampa Bay Lightning

headlines.description: — Shane Pinto scored his second goal of the night late in the third period to lift the Ottawa Senators to a 5-4 win over the Tampa Bay Lightning on Thursday in the opener for both clubs.

headlines.description: — Brad Marchand broke a tie at 2:19 of the third period and the two-time defending Stanley Cup champion Florida Panthers beat Philadelphia 2-1 on Thursday night to spoil Rick Tocchet's Flyers coaching debut.

events.name: Minnesota Wild at St. Louis Blues

headlines.description: — Ryan Hartman scored twice, Filip Gustavsson made 27 saves for his 12th NHL shutout and the Minnesota Wild beat the St. Louis Blues 5-0 on Thursday night in the opener for both teams.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hartman scores twice, Gustavsson makes 27 saves in Wild's 5-0 win over Blues in opener

events.name: Columbus Blue Jackets at Nashville Predators

headlines.description: — Ryan O'Reilly scored a power-play goal early in the third period, and the Nashville Predators opened the season Thursday night by beating the Blue Jackets 2-1 and extending their home winning streak over Columbus to 10 games.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ryan O'Reilly's power-play goal lifts the Predators to a 2-1 win over the Blue Jackets

headlines.description: — Mikko Rantanen scored the first goal and had two assists and the Dallas Stars won in coach Glen Gulutzan's return, overcoming Kyle Connor's hat trick to hold off the Winnipeg Jets 5-4 on Thursday night in the opener for both teams.
headlines.shortLinkText: Stars overcome Connor's hat trick to hold off the Jets 5-4 in Gulutzan's return

headlines.description: — Nathan MacKinnon scored the go-ahead goal early in the third period on a power play, Scott Wedgewood made 32 saves and the Colorado Avalanche beat the Utah Mammoth 2-1 on Thursday night.

events.name: Vegas Golden Knights at San Jose Sharks

headlines.description: — Reilly Smith tapped the puck into an open net in overtime following the second late-game blunder by San Jose goaltender Alex Nedeljkovic and the Vegas Golden Knights rallied for a 4-3 victory over the Sharks on Thursday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Golden Knights rally for 4-3 win in overtime after Sharks' late-game blunders

headlines.description: — Mason Marchment scored in his Seattle debut, Joey Daccord made 35 saves, and the Kraken beat the Anaheim Ducks 3-1 on Thursday night to win their season opener for the first time in team history.
headlines.shortLinkText: Marchment scores in Seattle debut as Kraken win season opener for first time
